description: This file defines a Flutter widget called ScoreBar that displays the current score and best score for a game, styled with an Ocean theme. It includes internal classes (_ScorePill) for score display components, and references external providers and Flutter material components.

classes.name: ScoreBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays the current score and best score with styling.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: A private widget used inside ScoreBar to display individual score information with styling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for ScoreBar and _ScorePill widgets, rendering score data with theme styling.
